book.synopsis: Follows the adventures of half-boy, half-girl martial artist Ranma, whose transforming gender problems began at the Accursed Springs in China when he became cursed to turn into a girl when splashed with cold water, and back into a boy with hot water.
book.dimensions: Height: 7.5 Inches, Length: 5 Inches, Weight: 0.4 Pounds, Width: 0.75 Inches
